snippet.title: My Little Pony: A Zephyr Heights Mystery - Official Announce Trailer
snippet.description: Join Sunny, Izzy, Misty, Pipp, Zipp, and Hitch, as they uncover the mystery surrounding the Zephyr Kingdom in My Little Pony: A Zephyr Heights Mystery. Out May 17 on PC, PlayStation, Switch, and Xbox.
